alert.note: Alert for Dinwiddie; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Southampton; Surry; Sussex; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Isle of Wight, northeastern Southampton, York, Sussex, southeastern Dinwiddie, southeastern James City, and Surry Counties, the City of Poquoson, the City of Franklin, the City of Hampton, the City of Newport News and the City of Williamsburg through 630 PM EDT... At 549 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from near Grove to near Dendron to near Jarratt. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds 30 to 35 mph. Rainfall 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locally heavy rainfall may cause minor flooding of poor drainage and low lying areas. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Newport News, Gloucester Point, Ivor, Dendron, Elberon, Lee Hall, Grove, Busch Gardens, Carver Gardens and York Terrace around 555 PM EDT. Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences around 600 PM EDT. Seaford around 605 PM EDT. Sussex around 610 PM EDT. Isle Of Wight around 615 PM EDT. Smithfield around 620 PM EDT. Homeville around 625 PM EDT. Christopher Newport University, Northampton, Rescue and Beaconsdale around 630 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Vicksville, Pons, Carrollton, Lackey, Chippokes State Park, Longview, Booker, Oriana, Yale and Lumberton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for south central, eastern and southeastern Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Dinwiddie; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; James City; Newport News; Southampton; Surry; Sussex; York
